com.facebook.buck.features.python.toolchain.impl

Class LazyPythonPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.features.python.toolchain.impl.LazyPythonPlatform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FlavorConvertible, PythonPlatform

    public class LazyPythonPlatform
extends Object
implements PythonPlatform
    An implementation of PythonPlatform that lazily creates PythonEnvironment and cxx library.

    This should be used to avoid creating all registered Python platform.
